tutorials.title: Make Your Own Rocket
tutorials.description: Learn how to create a colorful paper rocket that can fly! This fun craft teaches you about rockets and space travel. Perfect for ages 6-10.

tutorials.title: Star Mobile Craft
tutorials.description: Create a beautiful star mobile to hang in your room! Learn about constellations while making this decorative craft. Great for bedroom decoration!

tutorials.title: Planet Painting
tutorials.description: Paint your own solar system with fun colors and techniques! Learn about all 8 planets while creating beautiful art. Perfect for learning and creativity!

tutorials.title: Cosmic Slime
tutorials.description: Make sparkly cosmic slime with glitter and colors! A fun sensory activity that's safe and easy to make. Kids love playing with this stretchy, sparkly slime!
tutorials.materials: Glue, borax, water, glitter, food coloring

tutorials.title: Alien Mask
tutorials.description: Create your own friendly alien mask with paper and colors! Perfect for imaginative play and space-themed parties. Let your creativity shine!

tutorials.title: Constellation Cards
tutorials.description: Make beautiful constellation cards to learn about stars! Create your own set of educational cards showing different constellations in the night sky.

tutorials.title: Moon Phase Calendar
tutorials.description: Create a calendar that shows the phases of the moon! Learn about how the moon changes throughout the month with this educational craft.

tutorials.title: Space Diorama
tutorials.description: Build a 3D space scene in a shoebox! Create planets, stars, and rockets in your own mini universe. Great for school projects!
tutorials.materials: Shoebox, paint, clay, string, LED lights
